data.oai_dc:dc: Phenotypic measures of all nestling traits (body mass on d16, wing length on d16, PHA response on d13, brightness, hue and UV chroma of 1 tail feather on d16).Color traits are averaged for each individual. Nestlings were cross-fostered between 2005 and 2009 and thus RearID is their nest of rearing while GeneticID is their nest of origin. Sex is 1 for female, 2 for male and 0 when unknown. Vane tarsus, and wing length are measured in mm and weight_d16 is measured in g. machine refers to the spectrophotometer that was used for measuring tail feathers (1 for 2005-2006, 2 for the other years).
sexual selection|coloration|good genes|genetic correlation|immune response|heritability|wild|G matrix
